review: Love it. Quick and Easy to navigate.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The interface is very user friendly the experience is very pleasing. It seems like they put everything you need in this one box. Love it.
author: Caryl

review: Does it work in Europe while traveling ?I am afraid not, becouse of "regionalization".I purchased Prime, only to find that my purchase, my money,  does not work in Europe.During cold war Russians were jamming broadcast from BBC, Radio Free Europe or VOA.Now we have " regions".Nice.
author: as200

review: Awesome device. Very easy to use.
author: David Fier

review: A great little device that works wonderful for streaming videos, tv shows, music, and more. Set up was easy and the voice search works great.
author: William T. Trobaugh

review: You still need to have cable for most of it to work. :(
author: S. Goldsberry "Chase4Kids"

review: Will not stream without stuttering, My roku 3 works flawlessly, Had to give to a friend to use on faster network.
